Body:
Description: Our Endpoint Protector 5.8.1.0 virtual appliance server has been permanently damaged due to hardware failure. As a result, we would like to deploy a new virtual appliance as soon as possible.

Please guide us through the process of activating or re-registering a new instance. We can provide any necessary license information, previous appliance details, or logs (if recoverable).

Let us know if there are any steps or prerequisites we need to follow before the deployment.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.
wrong platform, changing platform to endpoint protector and sending this case to Technical Support Queue

What We've Learned Updated: 14.05
We have provided the download link for the 5.9.4.0 EPP appliance and the deployment steps.

Next Steps Updated: 14.05
Waiting for the customer to confirm if the deployment was successful, or if any additional help from our side is needed.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Iosif Muntean, Ramon Torres
Invitation updated. Attendees: Iosif Muntean, Ramon Torres, Ezequiel Lona

What We've Learned Updated: 14.05
We have provided the download link for the 5.9.4.0 EPP appliance and the deployment steps.

16.05
We managed to migrate all data and configurations from the old epp server to the new one. Also recommended the customer to upgrade the epp clients since these were from 2019.
